attributes.action: face a War Crimes Tribunal for his appalling crimes in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Never has ther been a more illegal use of force than in Iraq.  Time and again the British people were lied to by Mr Blair.  This petition asks that he submits to  properly convened war crimes tribunal where he will be answerable for his actions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
